item.title: SVD refresher
item.description: Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) Data-driven generalization of the Fourier Fransform. Singular Value Decomposition - Steve Brunton Barry Van Veen: The Singular Value Decomposition - Barry Van Veen 7. Eckart-Young: The Closest Rank k Matrix to A - Gilbert Strang CS168: The Modern Algorithmic Toolbox One of the most well used, general purpose tool in numerical linear algebra for data processing. We can use SVD as a data dimensionality reduction tool. SVD allows us to reduce high dimensional data (e.
